channel.title: Combat Arms
channel.description:
You guys may have seen the ads, but i was bored and decided to try it out. Its pretty fun actually :) And i dunno if someone else has posted this
heres some screens of me playin [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/460/screen1e.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/7484/screen2z.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7135/screen3f.png[/img]

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

It’s actually a fun game until you run out of credits and realize you have to play a shit load of games just to get a good gun for a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“spankjava, post:8, topic:272529”][quote author=Niall link=topic=359778.msg2751981#msg2751981 date=1239971412]
Holy shit, this is why I hate “free” games. It first installs some shitty client to download the game(which I should add did slow my internet speeds to a crawl after the main download), I then register an account and try to play only to find out, you cannot play if you live in Europe!!

I mean, this is like the 3rd or 4th game I’ve wasted an hour or so downloading just for it to tell me to gtfo because I’m not American.
[/quote]

There is EU version[/quote]

Sorry it didn’t tell me when I went to the site to download it, or when registering an account, or when trying to play…

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:9, topic:272529”][quote author=spankjava link=topic=359778.msg2754718#msg2754718 date=1240133432]

Holy shit, this is why I hate “free” games. It first installs some shitty client to download the game(which I should add did slow my internet speeds to a crawl after the main download), I then register an account and try to play only to find out, you cannot play if you live in Europe!!

I mean, this is like the 3rd or 4th game I’ve wasted an hour or so downloading just for it to tell me to gtfo because I’m not American.

There is EU version
[/quote]
And you have to pay stupid ingame credits to use a gun for a single day…[/quote]
You get more money every match, win or lose.

Read full topic

It first installs some shitty client to download the game(which I should add did slow my internet speeds to a crawl after the main download), I then register an account and try to play only to find out, you cannot play if you live in Europe!!

i know what you mean its like ffs we arent all fucking yanks just let me play!. Nexuiz is a good one you can try thats free and ive been playing that for about 3-4 years. Also theres one called assualt cube i think thats not as good but it has weapons more like this

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Holy shit, this is why I hate “free” games. It first installs some shitty client to download the game(which I should add did slow my internet speeds to a crawl after the main download), I then register an account and try to play only to find out, you cannot play if you live in Europe!!

I mean, this is like the 3rd or 4th game I’ve wasted an hour or so downloading just for it to tell me to gtfo because I’m not American.
